Transportation & Vehicles.name: Automotive Anatomy 101
Transportation & Vehicles.description: Test your knowledge of car parts and terminology with this quiz. From axles to calipers, we're covering the basics of automotive engineering. Are you a gearhead or just along for the ride?

questions.text: How many axles does a standard automobile have?
questions.hint: Consider the number of wheel pairs on a typical car.

questions.text: On which part of a car would you find the 'caliper'?
questions.hint: This component is crucial for stopping the vehicle safely.

questions.text: What car company once manufactured and sold the 'Datsun' line of automobiles?
questions.hint: This Japanese company rebranded its vehicles under its own name in the 1980s.
